courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: Restricted to first-year freshman and transfer students.
description: Grand Challenge Learning course in the Sustainability, Energy & the Environment pathway. Introduction to the fundamentals of social science with an emphasis on environmental sustainability and experiential learning through projects, design-based thinking, community-engaged scholarship, or field trips. Topics vary by section. Prerequisite: Restricted to first-year freshman and transfer students.
label: Sustainability and Social Science
sectionCappArea: Restricted to First Time Freshman or Transfer student - first time students.
sectionDegreeAttributes: Grand Challenge-Sustainability, and Social Sciences course.
